Injuries: Lower back pain [Non-specific low back pain]
Lower back pain with shooting leg pain (sciatica) [Lumbar disc herniation with radiculopathy]
Back pain worse when arching backward [Lumbar facet joint pain]
One-sided buttock/back pain near the "dimples" [Sacroiliac joint dysfunction]
Neck pain or stiffness [Cervical strain]
Neck pain after a car accident [Whiplash-associated disorder]
Headache that starts in the neck [Cervicogenic headache]

Chronic Disease: Chronic low back pain (chronic back pain)
Injuries: Shoulder pain when lifting to the side [Rotator cuff tendinopathy]
Sudden shoulder weakness after injury [Rotator cuff tear]
Shoulder pinch when raising arm overhead [Subacromial impingement]
Stiff shoulder that barely moves [Frozen shoulder (adhesive capsulitis)]
Front-of-shoulder pain with lifting [Biceps tendinopathy]
Shoulder feels loose or like it might pop out [Shoulder instability]
Top of shoulder pain after a fall [AC joint sprain]
Deep shoulder click or catch with overhead use [Labral tear (SLAP/Bankart)]
Outer elbow pain with gripping [Tennis elbow (lateral epicondylitis)]
Inner elbow pain with gripping [Golfer's elbow (medial epicondylitis)]
Elbow pain from throwing [UCL sprain]
Swollen bump on back of elbow [Olecranon bursitis]
Hand numbness or tingling at night [Carpal tunnel syndrome]
Thumb-side wrist pain with lifting a baby or phone [De Quervain tenosynovitis]
Wrist pain on pinky side after a fall [TFCC injury]
Sore wrist after a fall [Wrist sprain]

Chronic Disease: Femoroacetabular impingement / hip labral pathology (hip impingement)
Injuries: Thumb hurts after a fall while holding something [Skier's thumb (UCL sprain)]
Mid-back tightness or ache [Thoracic spine pain]
Chest wall pain that is tender to touch [Costochondritis]
Stiff or achy hip when walking [Hip osteoarthritis]
Pinch at the front of the hip with deep squats [Femoroacetabular impingement (FAI)]
Pain on the outside of the hip when lying on that side [Gluteal tendinopathy / GTPS]
Front hip or groin pull [Hip flexor strain]
Buttock pain with sitting, maybe leg tingling [Piriformis syndrome]
Hip clicking or catching when turning [Hip labral tear]
Pulled hamstring [Hamstring strain]
Pulled quad [Quadriceps strain]
Groin strain [Adductor strain]
Kneecap pain with stairs or squats [Patellofemoral pain (runner's knee)]

Chronic Disease: Limb loss with prosthetic gait needs (amputation with prosthesis)
Injuries: Tender spot just below the kneecap [Patellar tendinopathy (jumper's knee)]
Knee clicks, locks, or hurts after a twist [Meniscus tear]
Knee gave way after a twist or landing [ACL tear/sprain]
Inner knee soreness after a side hit [MCL sprain]
Stiff or achy knee with activity [Knee osteoarthritis]
Outside knee pain while running [Iliotibial band syndrome]
Swollen kneecap from lots of kneeling [Prepatellar bursitis]
Shin pain after starting or upping running [Shin splints (medial tibial stress syndrome)]
Pinpoint bone pain that worsens with impact [Stress fracture (tibia or metatarsals)]
Pulled calf [Calf strain]
Achy or sore Achilles tendon [Achilles tendinopathy]
Rolled ankle with swelling on the outside [Lateral ankle sprain]
Pain above the ankle after twisting the leg [High ankle sprain (syndesmotic)]

Chronic Disease: Vestibular hypofunction - unilateral or bilateral (inner-ear balance loss)
Injuries: Heel pain with first steps in the morning [Plantar fasciitis]

Chronic Disease: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV / positional vertigo)
Balance impairment and fall risk (falls risk)
Coronary artery disease / stable angina (heart disease / chest pain)
Peripheral artery disease with claudication (PAD / poor leg circulation)
Nonalcoholic fatty liver disease / NASH (fatty liver)
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD / chronic bronchitis / emphysema)
Interstitial lung disease / pulmonary fibrosis (lung scarring)
Dyspareunia related to pelvic floor (painful intercourse)
Chronic prostatitis / chronic pelvic pain syndrome (CP/CPPS)
Primary chronic pain conditions (chronic primary pain)
Complex regional pain syndrome (CRPS / reflex sympathetic dystrophy)
Hemophilia with joint arthropathy (bleeding-disorder joint damage)
Chronic venous insufficiency with edema (leg vein insufficiency)
